allow:
Bash("C:\\Program Files\\R\\R-4.5.2\\bin\\Rscript.exe" -e "
checkpoint <- readRDS\(''data/checkpoint/usn_urls.RDS''\)
valid_2022 <- checkpoint[!is.na\(checkpoint[[''url'']]\) & grepl\(''2022'', checkpoint[[''url'']]\), ]
print\(head\(valid_2022, 5\)\)
")

hooks.command: powershell -Command "[System.Reflection.Assembly]::LoadWithPartialName('System.Windows.Forms') | Out-Null; [console]::beep(294,100); [console]::beep(370,100); [console]::beep(440,80); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 50; [console]::beep(370,80); [console]::beep(440,200); $balloon = New-Object System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon; $balloon.Icon = [System.Drawing.SystemIcons]::Information; $balloon.BalloonTipTitle = 'Claude Code'; $balloon.BalloonTipText = 'Awaiting your input'; $balloon.Visible = $True; $balloon.ShowBalloonTip(5000)"
